title: RP ADDTO: Finite induction (for finite ordinals)
content: Original probably needs new subsection for Relation-related existence theorems.

blocks.name: cnvcnvintabd
blocks.content: Value of the relationship content of the intersection of a class. (Contributed by RP, 20-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvcnvintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1)))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1)))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w1)))), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))))))))
  syl5bb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))))))))
  pm5.32i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))))
  albidv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))))))
  imbi2d(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))
  bicomd(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))), cin(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  cnvcnv(cv(s0))
  rbaib(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  elin(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))), wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  bicomd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  syl(w0, wb(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wex(s0, w1))
  pm5.5(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  elcnvcnvintab(s0, cv(hs0), w1)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w1))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elmapintrab(s1, s0, cv(hs0), universe, cxp(universe, universe), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))), w1)
  mp2b(wcel(ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))), universe), wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), universe))
  vex(s0)
  cnvexg(cv(s0), universe)
  cnvexg(ccnv(cv(s0)), universe)
  mpbi(wss(ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))
  relcnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))
  df-rel(ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, ccnv(cv(s0)))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
